str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pass through, spread (as a report). From dia and erchomai; to traverse.
Syria, a great Roman imperial province, united with Cilicia. Probably of Hebrew origin; Syria, a region of Asia.
Probably of foreign origin; Cilicia, a region of Asia Minor.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To prop up, uphold, support, confirm, make stronger. From epi and sterizo; to support further, i.e. Reestablish.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
